target.mrk: RENAME COLUMN statement

seg-source.mrk: RENAME COLUMN statement

target.mrk: RENAME COLUMN statement

seg-source.mrk: SQL statements

target.mrk: SQL statements

seg-source.mrk: RENAME COLUMN

target.mrk: RENAME COLUMN

seg-source.mrk: columns

target.mrk: columns

seg-source.mrk: renaming

target.mrk: renaming

trans-unit.source: Use the RENAME COLUMN statement to rename a column in a table.

seg-source.mrk: Use the RENAME COLUMN statement to rename a column in a table.

target.mrk: Use the RENAME COLUMN statement to rename a column in a table.

trans-unit.source: The RENAME COLUMN statement allows you to rename an existing column in an existing table in any schema (except the schema SYS).

seg-source.mrk: The RENAME COLUMN statement allows you to rename an existing column in an existing table in any schema (except the schema SYS).

target.mrk: The RENAME COLUMN statement allows you to rename an existing column in an existing table in any schema (except the schema SYS).

trans-unit.source: To rename a column, you must either be the database owner or the table owner.

seg-source.mrk: To rename a column, you must either be the database owner or the table owner.

target.mrk: To rename a column, you must either be the database owner or the table owner.

trans-unit.source: Other types of table alterations are possible; see <xref href="rrefsqlj81859.dita#rrefsqlj81859"></xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Other types of table alterations are possible; see <xref href="rrefsqlj81859.dita#rrefsqlj81859"></xref> for more information.

target.mrk: Other types of table alterations are possible; see <xref href="rrefsqlj81859.dita#rrefsqlj81859"></xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Syntax

target.mrk: Syntax

seg-source.mrk: RENAME COLUMN tableName.simpleColumnName TO simpleColumnName

target.mrk: RENAME COLUMN tableName.simpleColumnName TO simpleColumnName

seg-source.mrk: Examples

target.mrk: Examples

trans-unit.source: To rename the manager column in table employee to supervisor, use the following syntax:

seg-source.mrk: To rename the manager column in table employee to supervisor, use the following syntax:

target.mrk: To rename the manager column in table employee to supervisor, use the following syntax:

seg-source.mrk: RENAME COLUMN EMPLOYEE.MANAGER TO SUPERVISOR

target.mrk: RENAME COLUMN EMPLOYEE.MANAGER TO SUPERVISOR

trans-unit.source: You can combine ALTER TABLE and RENAME COLUMN to modify a column's data type. To change column c1 of table t to the new data type NEWTYPE:

seg-source.mrk: You can combine ALTER TABLE and RENAME COLUMN to modify a column's data type.
To change column c1 of table t to the new data type NEWTYPE:

target.mrk: You can combine ALTER TABLE and RENAME COLUMN to modify a column's data type.
To change column c1 of table t to the new data type NEWTYPE:

trans-unit.source: ALTER TABLE t ADD COLUMN c1_newtype NEWTYPE UPDATE t SET c1_newtype = c1 ALTER TABLE t DROP COLUMN c1 RENAME COLUMN t.c1_newtype TO c1

seg-source.mrk: ALTER TABLE t ADD COLUMN c1_newtype NEWTYPE UPDATE t SET c1_newtype = c1 ALTER TABLE t DROP COLUMN c1 RENAME COLUMN t.c1_newtype TO c1

target.mrk: ALTER TABLE t ADD COLUMN c1_newtype NEWTYPE UPDATE t SET c1_newtype = c1 ALTER TABLE t DROP COLUMN c1 RENAME COLUMN t.c1_newtype TO c1

seg-source.mrk: Usage notes

target.mrk: Usage notes

trans-unit.source: If a view, trigger, check constraint, foreign key constraint, or generationClause of a generated column references the column, an attempt to rename it will generate an error.

seg-source.mrk: If a view, trigger, check constraint, foreign key constraint, or generationClause of a generated column references the column, an attempt to rename it will generate an error.

target.mrk: If a view, trigger, check constraint, foreign key constraint, or generationClause of a generated column references the column, an attempt to rename it will generate an error.

trans-unit.source: The RENAME COLUMN statement is not allowed if there are any open cursors that reference the column that is being altered.

seg-source.mrk: The RENAME COLUMN statement is not allowed if there are any open cursors that reference the column that is being altered.

target.mrk: The RENAME COLUMN statement is not allowed if there are any open cursors that reference the column that is being altered.

trans-unit.source: If there is an index defined on the column, the column can still be renamed; the index is automatically updated to refer to the column by its new name

seg-source.mrk: If there is an index defined on the column, the column can still be renamed; the index is automatically updated to refer to the column by its new name

target.mrk: If there is an index defined on the column, the column can still be renamed; the index is automatically updated to refer to the column by its new name
